A frontend dashboard interface that displays financial data from multiple companies
A backend API service that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
User authentication and authorization system to manage access to financial data
Company management module allowing users to add, edit, and remove company profiles
Financial data ingestion capability to collect and store financial information per company
Data visualization components for displaying financial metrics and trends
Consolidated reporting feature that aggregates financial data across all companies
Cross-company comparison tools enabling users to compare financial performance
Interactive browsing interface for viewing individual company financial details
Real-time data fetching from backend APIs with no hardcoded or mock data
Styling with mint cream background and teal-colored UI components throughout the application
Responsive design ensuring dashboard usability across different device sizes
Export functionality for financial reports in common formats (PDF, CSV)
Search and filtering capabilities for navigating financial data efficiently
Configuration of package.json to support concurrent frontend and backend development startup
